definition: a control (e.g. button, text box etc) (computing)
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: The controls line up so that they can be read like an English sentence.
sentences.chinese: 控件整队排列，使它们读起来像一个英语句子。

sentences.english: The motion has a distinct realistic quality, as the objects first accelerate and then decelerate.
sentences.chinese: 动作显得很逼真，选择的控件先是加速，再略略减慢。

sentences.english: Creates a single-line text entry control.
sentences.chinese: 创建一个单行的文本输入控件。

sentences.english: Non-interactive items that are included in the control view cannot receive keyboard focus.
sentences.chinese: 控件视图中包括的非交互式项不能接收键盘焦点。

sentences.english: The chapter 5 expounds the implementation technology of Mongolian editor control.
sentences.chinese: 第五章阐述了蒙文编辑控件的实现技术。

sentences.english: In the bottom pane, double-click the control.
sentences.chinese: 在右窗格中双击该控件。

sentences.english: The value provider supplies the suggestion list to the auto-complete control.
sentences.chinese: 值提供者会为自动完成控件提供建议列表。

sentences.english: For example, the drop-down arrow in a combo box control is a button.
sentences.chinese: 例如，组合框控件中的下拉箭头就是一个按钮。

sentences.english: This enables you to add browser-specific attributes to your controls.
sentences.chinese: 这允许您向控件添加浏览器特定特性。

sentences.english: COM-based ActiveX technology was applied to the software development of dynamic signal analysis control.
sentences.chinese: 对动态信号分析控件开发和应用做了较深入的研究。

sentences.english: This error arises when a change is made to a file that is currently checked in to source-code control.
sentences.chinese: 当更改当前签入到源代码控件的文件时，出现此错误。

sentences.english: The article introduces an enhanced version of the standard MFC status bar control.
sentences.chinese: 演示了一个增强版的标准MFC状态条控件。

sentences.english: And the C-language data structure and flow charts are given.
sentences.chinese: 并给出了控件的C语言数据结构和工作流程图。

sentences.english: When the user right-clicks on the control, the context menu pops up.
sentences.chinese: 当用户在控件上右击时会弹出快捷菜单。

sentences.english: The chapter 4 introduces the design and implementation of Mongolian editor control.
sentences.chinese: 第四章介绍了蒙古文编辑控件的设计与实现方法。

sentences.english: Forces the control to apply layout logic to all its child controls.
sentences.chinese: 强制控件将布局逻辑应用于子控件。

definition: plug-in (software or hardware)/to plug in a component
form (used in programming languages such as Visual Basic and Delphi to create a GUI window)
tab window (in a web browser etc)/paging/pagination/page break (computing)
